About Me

I transform raw data into strategic assets by building end-to-end analytics solutions—from ETL pipelines and data modeling to interactive dashboards and predictive insights. With a Diploma in Advanced Analytics and hands-on experience across the data lifecycle, I help businesses turn raw data into actionable insights.

My Expertise:
ETL & Data Engineering: Designing scalable data pipelines for seamless ingestion and transformation.
Power BI: Creating intuitive Power BI reports that drive data-driven decision-making.
Advanced Analytics: Develop KPIs, statistical models, and ML-driven insights.
Data Science: Regression, clustering, and time-series forecasting for actionable predictions.
Data Governance: Ensure clean, documented, and scalable data pipelines.

Whether it’s automating data workflows, cleaning messy datasets, or delivering stakeholder-ready analytics, I bridge the gap between data and strategy—ensuring clarity, accuracy, and impact.

Demo Projects

Power BI Project - Monitor & Improve Gross profit

The project demonstrate the use of Power BI to monitor and improve gross profit. It includes key metrics on a dashboard that provides insights into gross grofit, cost breakdown, and profitability metrics. The dashboard allows users to filter data by different dimensions such as work week, employee, manager etc.

Power BI SQL Analytics Data Visualization

Predicting The Costs Of Used Cars (3rd place)

Cars are more than just a utility for many. They are often the pride and status of the family. We all have different tastes when it comes to owning a car or at least when thinking of owning one. Predicting the costs of used cars given the data collected from various sources and distributed across various locations in India.

website link

Explore how Power BI can transform real estate data into actionable insights! In this demo, I showcase an interactive dashboard built for the real estate sector using advanced Power BI visuals such as Maps, Key Influencer, and Decomposition Tree.
